passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(95) > div > section > header:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(96) > section:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
